title: Annotating a Plot Using Matplotlib
description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of annotating a plot using Matplotlib. Annotating a plot is a useful way to highlight specific features or data points on a graph. In this tutorial, we will demonstrate how to annotate a plot with an arrow pointing to provided coordinates.
